title.narrative: Strengthening the efficiency of funding policy

description.narrative: The most important influencing channels of Finlands Development Policy in Development Financing Institutions are Capital Increase and the Replenishments which are organized every third year and work regarding the Board and participating to the work of the Constituency Offices . Regarding the World Bankit is the Development Committee and regarding Regional Development Banks the Annual Meetings and meetings taking place during them likee.g. regarding Thematic Trust Funds and Partnerships that are most import ant. Innovative ways of funding is the increasing element in International Development Finance. During this regime the Government of Finland has adopted new Finance Investment Instrument and for the quality assurance reasons various kinds of consultations etc. are needed from time to time. To confirm and boost the work Finland is doing the Unit for Development Financing Institutions has established this program for funding related activities like negotiations planning fact finding and interaction.
